examples: As the peach ripened, its pericarp softened and its sweet aroma filled the room.
The squirrel nibbled on the pericarp of the hazelnut, trying to access the tasty kernel hidden inside.
words.defineEn: the protective outer layer of a fruit that develops from the ovary wall after fertilization
words.defineVi: lớp ngoài bảo vệ của quả phát triển từ thành bầu nhụy sau khi thụ tinh

examples: The chef prepared a fleshy avocado salad, combining its creamy texture with tangy dressing.
She plucked a fleshy strawberry from the garden and enjoyed its juicy sweetness.
The children enjoyed the fleshy pulp of the mango, their faces smeared with its sweet and sticky juice.
Imagine a fleshy cube.
See that fleshy tent there?
words.defineEn: (of plant or fruit tissue) soft, juicy, and succulent, often with a high water content
words.defineVi: (của mô thực vật hoặc trái cây) mềm, mọng nước và mọng nước, thường có hàm lượng nước cao

examples: They shared a glace plum tart after their meal.
The children eagerly reached for the glace lollipops at the candy store.
He couldn't resist the glace coating on the freshly baked donut.
words.defineEn: describing something that has been coated with a glossy or sugary surface
words.defineVi: mô tả một cái gì đó đã được phủ một bề mặt bóng hoặc có đường

examples: He carefully selected the least overripe avocados from the pile.
They found an overripe watermelon in their garden, its rind was dull and the flesh was overly soft and sweet.
She discovered an overripe banana in the fruit bowl, its peel turned completely brown and mushy.
This chimpanzee stumbles across a windfall of overripe plums.
The sugars in overripe fruit attract microscopic organisms known as yeasts.
words.defineEn: describing the condition of being excessively ripe or beyond the point of optimal freshness
words.defineVi: mô tả tình trạng quá chín hoặc vượt quá độ tươi tối ưu

words.defineEn: having had the pits or stones removed
words.defineVi: đã loại bỏ các hố hoặc đá

examples: The time was ripe for change in the company.
The market had ripe oranges with bright orange peels.
My mom peeled a ripe banana for me.
The bramble bushes along the hiking trail were filled with ripe dewberries.
The delicate aroma of ripe may apples fills the kitchen.
words.defineEn: describing a fruit or crop that has completed its growth and is ready to be eaten
words.defineVi: mô tả một loại trái cây hoặc cây trồng đã hoàn thành quá trình tăng trưởng và sẵn sàng để ăn

examples: The greengage is a seasonal fruit, typically available during the late summer months.
The restaurant offered a vegetarian dish with a mix of seasonal vegetables.
The bakery showcased a special maple sugar cake as the highlight of their seasonal menu.
As the winter approached, he started preparing his garden for the planting of seasonal flowers.
They decided to visit a local farm to pick their own seasonal fruits and vegetables.
words.defineEn: relating to or happening during a particular season of the year
words.defineVi: liên quan đến hoặc xảy ra trong một mùa cụ thể của năm

words.defineEn: describing something, particularly food, that has been dried in the sun
words.defineVi: mô tả một cái gì đó, đặc biệt là thực phẩm, đã được làm khô dưới ánh mặt trời
